Class TestImageThresholding

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class TestImageThresholding
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Remy Malgouyres Allows to test images' thresholding methods.
    See Also:
    ImageThresholding

      • testApplyThresholdMinAndMax

        public static void testApplyThresholdMinAndMax(java.lang.String inputImageFile,
                                               java.lang.String outputFile1,
                                               java.lang.String outputFile2,
                                               double min,
                                               double max)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Validates image colors Thresholding and sets to zero the voxels of which are not between a set minimum and maximum value.
        Parameters:
        inputImageFile - the source file for image data.
        outputFile1 - output text file for the histogram before contrast operation.
        outputFile2 - output text file for the histogram after contrast operation.
        min - The minimum value of the display range that remains, between 0.0 and 1.0.
        max - The maximum value of the display range that remains, between 0.0 and 1.0.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        ImageContrast.adjustValuesRange(double, double)
